haystack.meta:
I remind the House that I will be in the Chair until about 3.30 pm, or until there are no further Members wishing to take their seats, so if Members wishing to take their seats would come to the Table, we can proceed.
The following Members took and subscribed the Oath, or made and subscribed the Affirmation required by law:
Right honourable Theresa Villiers, for Chipping Barnet
Paul Phillip Flynn, Newport West
Tobias Martin Ellwood, Bournemouth East
Right honourable Keith Robert Simpson, Broadland
Right honourable Sir Gregory Knight, East Yorkshire
James Philip Duddridge, Rochford and Southend East
Mike Freer, Finchley and Golders Green
Gavin Andrew Stuart Newlands, Paisley and Renfrewshire North
Andrew James Griffiths, Burton
Derek Gordon Thomas, St Ives
Richard Quentin Fuller, Bedford
Robin Caspar Walker, Worcester
Michael Louis David Fabricant, Lichfield
Andrew Francis Slaughter, Hammersmith
David John Warburton, Somerton and Frome
Right honourable Andrew John Bower Mitchell, Sutton Coldfield
Right honourable Simon Hugh McGuigan Burns, Chelmsford
Stephen William Hammond, Wimbledon
David John Mowat, Warrington South
Henry Edward Millar Smith, Crawley
Gavin James Robinson, Belfast East
Alexander Boris de Pfeffel Johnson, Uxbridge and South Ruislip
Adam James Harold Holloway, Gravesham
Adam Afriyie, Windsor
Conor Burns, Bournemouth West
Christopher Robert Chope, Christchurch
Daniel Leonard James Poulter, Central Suffolk and North Ipswich
Edward Glyn Davies, Montgomeryshire
Right honourable Michael Hugh Meacher, Oldham West and Royton

I remind the House that I shall be in the Chair until about 3.30 pm, or for as long as there are Members wishing to take the oath this afternoon. Will Members wishing to take their seats please come to the Table?
The following Members took and subscribed the Oath, or made and subscribed the Affirmation required by law:
Richard Grosvenor Plunkett-Ernle-Erle-Drax, for South Dorset
Jeremy Bernard Corbyn, Islington North
Jonathan George Caladine Lord, Woking
